access: Due to the use of technology, all gadgets are uncommon or rare, though inventors and regions with access to inventors have access to uncommon gadgets.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs=""
>
[Material Essence Disruptor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1118)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Gadget" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=405" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 71</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

**Access**  Due to the use of technology, all gadgets are uncommon or rare, though inventors and regions with access to inventors have access to uncommon gadgets.

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A material essence disruptor emits bursts of disordered energy to break down the structure of a spell that manipulates material essence. Attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) an active [arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11) or [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134) spell within the listed range, with the listed counteract modifier and counteract level.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Material Essence Disruptor (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 71</row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The range is 30 feet, the counteract modifier is +7, and the counteract level is 2.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Material Essence Disruptor (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 71</row>

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The range is 40 feet, the counteract modifier is +13, and the counteract level is 4.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Material Essence Disruptor (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 71</row>

**Price** 1,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The range is 60 feet, the counteract modifier is +18, and the counteract level is 6.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 15"
pfs="Standard"
>
Material Essence Disruptor (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 71</row>

**Price** 6,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The range is 90 feet, the counteract modifier is +24, and the counteract level is 8.
name: Material Essence Disruptor (Moderate)
